title: STOP RELEASING NEW CHAMPS AND START FIXING CURRENT CHAMPS!!!
body: STOP WASTING TIME RELEASING NEW CHAMPS WHEN THERE ARE CHAMPS THAT NEED TO BE FIXED LIKE {{champion:84}} {{champion:10}} {{champion:20}} {{champion:13}} AND MORE! I'M TIRED OF SEEING NEW CHAMPS AND RIOT DOES NOTHING TO UPDATE CURRENT ONES! DOES RIOT NOT SEE THAT?

replies.body: And pray tell whats wrong with the champs
Akali and Nunu are already confirmed for updates idk maybe TC is trolling
What ever you need to tell yourself nunu is strong af how is me giving you ap ad and attack speed trolling. Shyt nunu cam gank better tgen most jungkers
I didn't say I agree with Riot's decision to remake him but they are doing it regardless of how anyone feels.

they have separate teams for these things. they do both new champs and champ updates at the same time.

they could hire more people to the champ update team to do more champ updates at a time but it's not ideal to change the game that rapidly.

Um I would say they have been more focused on fixing old champs, how could YOU NOT see that?{{champion:50}} {{champion:28}} {{champion:14}} {{champion:6}} {{champion:19}} {{champion:39}}

Let the bronze/wood players struggle against his Passive and W. Helps them teach everyone how to kite vs Aurelion.

Q is okay for outplaying a dueling champion, but true damage, W healing damage reduction, E true damage and a second {{summoner:6}} +bonus atk speed on Ult has to go. {{champion:157}} Ah yes, everyones' most hated champion tied with Teemo. I could make a long description for Yasuo, but I can create a discussion about him another time. But I do have a goal for Riot on reworking Yasuo: **Make him a fully-dedicated mid-laner again**. We can erase windwall and his unlimited dash, but still give him a healthy defensive ablity where Mage or adcs who are skillshot-reliant can get around.
